GapFillInput.Title: Second Conditional
GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct answer in each gap.
GapFillInput.ContentGapFillInput:
1. If I won(win) some money, I would fly|'d fly(fly) to India.
2. If you lived(live) here, would you get(get) a job?
3. I would feel|'d feel(feel) better if I stopped(stop) smoking.
4. She wouldn't play(not play) rugby if she didn't enjoy|did not enjoy(not enjoy) it.
5. If you could travel(can travel) around the world, where would you go(go)?
6. Would they come(come) home if they had(have) the choice?
7. Who would you meet(meet) if you could meet(can meet) anybody in the world?
8. We would move|'d move(move) to another country if we didn't like|did not like(not like) the weather.
9. They would win|'d win(win) the final if they had(have) a better manager.
10. If he wasn't|was not(not be) so tired, he would come|'d come(come) with us.
